Judul: CREATING PRODUCT AND SERVICE DIFERENTIATION ON CAFE
Abstrak: In this study, the author who is also has a role as one of the owners of the business that was made by four people, will put more emphasis to the problems that occur in the business, namely in making cafe with the new brand called Coffee Paste.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: DR. Mustika Sufiati Purwanegara, M.Sc.
Kata Kunci: Coffee Paste, target market, competitors, Drinks, Light Meal, differentiation
